title: New: Wise Blood – Rat
body:
After a forced two or three day absence (server issues, apologies), CitR is back, and what better to announce our return with than a new track from Pittsburgh genius **Wise Blood**.

Having seemingly been kicking about for an age, **Christopher Laufman** is finally prepping the release of his debut LP, _**id**_, out 25 June via Dovecote. Rat, the first track taken from **_id_**, premiered via [The Fader](http://www.thefader.com/2013/04/10/stream-wise-blood-rat/) alongside a short interview, is a colourful, frantic slice of tropical pop. With the near rap delivery, not too disimilar to **WHY?**, and **Idiot Glee** style instrumental sections, it’s more than enough to get me very excited for **_id_**.
